title.bibl: Danish Times, Jan. 10, 1936. Dr. Max Henius' Memorial

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

div.bibl: Danish Times, Jan. 10, 1936. DR. MAX HENIUS' MEMORIAL

body.p: The memorial services held in honor of Mr. Max Henius, were sponsored by the Danish Societies of Chicago and his friends, on Sunday, January 12, 1:30 P. M. at the University of Chicago Chapel, 1166 East 59th Street.

The Danish Societies of Chicago and the friends of the late Dr. Max Henius wish to express their appreciation to the University of Chicago for the kind invitation extended to them to hold the memorial services in the chapel.
The following Danes spoke at the services: Reverend Oswald Helsing, F. M. Dupont, of the Wahl-Henius Institute, Dr. Emanuel Nielsen, Dr. J. Charles Bay, Carl B. Roden, and the Hon. R. Bauman.
